オプション1:
Star Man clenched his teeth and forced himself to walk all the way back to the ruins.
The moment he arrived, he collapsed.
Triangle Man came over.
"What happened?"
"...Poison..."
"Huh?"
"I ate this... it was poison..."
Triangle Man stared intently at the red fruit.
"Water..."
"Water? Got it!"
Triangle Man and Rectangle Man brought coconuts together.
After drinking the coconut water, Star Man was taken by the two to Trapezoid Man’s room.
"You okay...?"

"Hah... hah... hah...
One more bite and I would've been dead..."
"Aren’t you supposed to test it in small amounts instead of just taking a bite?"
Trapezoid Man spoke.

"Hah... hah... ahh...
I think I might’ve seen that online before..."

"You put the juice on your skin, test it on your lips,
then try just a grain-sized bite or something, right?"
"Yeah... what do they call that again...?"
"I forgot..."

"Let’s try that method where you test it little by little...
None of us really know much about wild plants..."
"Oh... there’s stuff you can make edible by soaking it in water for a week, right?"
"Yeah... I’ve heard of that."

Trapezoid Man thought about suggesting they experiment with the red fruit,
but seeing Star Man in pain, he held his tongue.
The next morning.
Star Man spent the night vomiting and suffering from diarrhea—and ended up thinner by morning.
(I'm feeling better... I think I can at least walk around near the house.)
When he went to Triangle Man’s room, he saw a pile of coconuts.
"Thanks for yesterday.
You’ve gathered a lot of coconuts. Did you knock them all down with rocks?"
"Halfway through, I stopped throwing rocks and just hit the coconuts directly with a branch. They fell easily."
"Oh?"
(Smart...)

"I want to try that method Trapezoid Man mentioned—soaking them in water for a week.
I’ll bring them over this evening, so help me then."
"S-sure."
Star Man went to retrieve the red fruit from yesterday.
